title: Getting Started with MERN Stack
content: This article explains how to set up a MERN stack project with MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js.
author: Ajay Kumar

title: Understanding React Hooks
content: A complete guide to React Hooks including useState, useEffect, and custom hooks with examples.
author: Priya Sharma

title: Mastering Node.js API Development
content: Learn how to build RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express, including middleware and error handling.
author: Rahul Verma

title: MongoDB Best Practices
content: Tips and tricks for designing efficient MongoDB schemas, indexing, and query optimization.
author: Sneha Patel

title: Deploying MERN Apps on Render
content: Step-by-step tutorial on deploying a MERN application using Render with CI/CD integration.
author: Vikram Singh
